argumentsAndDecisions.complaintSummary: Failure to address persistent mold growth and moisture issues in wall near living room window
argumentsAndDecisions.violatedCode: CA Health & Safety Code Section 17920.3(a)(11), Civil Code Section 1941.1
argumentsAndDecisions.respondentHadNotice: Yes, multiple work orders filed and maintenance visits documented
argumentsAndDecisions.evidenceAssessment: Landlord failed to provide evidence of repairs, had inconsistent records, and could not produce photos showing completed work
argumentsAndDecisions.impactAssessment: Severe health impact - AT&T worker required specialized mask, neighbor wouldn't allow child to enter premises, tenants experienced physical symptoms
